thread.title: MELINDA L GUY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MELINDA L GUY

author: MELINDA L GUY
title: MELINDA L GUY
text: I thought I had a rental car already reserved with a different company. I get in Sydney and give them a call only to find out no reservation. Went to several of the other Car Rentals at the Airport, and all had nothing. Went up to Redspot and as I thought nothing available. I asked if she knew where I could find a rental car I was desperate needed one for 12 days. The young lady said if you don't mind waiting til noon It was 8 am. I said I would and Thank You, well within 10 minutes she had a car for me. She and the Company made my vacation great. Even told me of a few Hot Spots to go Dancing.
